Title: Requires the city of New York to mitigate property damage caused by environmental issues which are caused by acts or omissions of such municipality
Summary: Requires the city of New York to mitigate property damage caused by environmental issues which are caused by acts or omissions of such municipality.
ActClause: AN ACT relating to requiring the city of New York to mitigate certain property damage caused by environmental issues which are caused by acts or omissions of such municipality
